entries.title: I am leaving The Blaze... (Mug Club Forever)
entries.description:
I am leaving The Blaze.

I have lost sleep over this for months. I knew that I wasn’t going to renew. The Blaze knew that I wasn’t going to renew.

I only know that there are well over 300,000 of you who have paid to signup and watch and that hundreds of thousands of you watch on Mug Club every day. This is in addition to the 2 million or so plays and downloads for each individual show.

So please, as Mug Club finds a new home, do NOT lose touch with us. Sign up at MugClubForever.com and you will NEVER RECEIVE an email from me, aside from if, when and where Mug Club’s new home will be. Some of you MAY receive an immediate email to confirm that you signed up just to ensure it doesn’t go to spam. And I ask that you all check your spam because due to issues outside of my control, it’s going to take some time before I can figure out exactly where Mug Club lands.

All I ask is that right now is that if you want Mug Club to continue, enter your email so that we can make that happen.

entries.title: HUGE ANNOUNCEMENT:THE FUTURE OF MUG CLUB & LWC  (Show Notes)
entries.description:
Yes, someone is trying to replace you ... but it's not who you think. Also, "women" whom Elon Musk fired are suing. NYC is a hellhole. And we have a MAJOR announcement concerning "Louder with Crowder."

MugClubForever.com

MISC

  • Words heard at the first NHL All-Trans Draft Tournament
  • Women sue Musk’s Twitter alleging discriminatory layoffs

NYC ARSON & HAMBURGLAR

  • Massive fire at NYPD impound facility in Red Hook, Brooklyn
  • Massive fire breaks out at NYPD impound, evidence warehouse in Brooklyn
  • Knife-wielding 'Hamburglar' robs nuggets, burgers from Bronx McDonald's

REPLACING YOU / LOW FERTILITY

  • Migrants could be encouraged to move to rural areas to boost economies and population
  • And what caused the surge in illegal immigration?
  • Growing share of childless adults in U.S. don’t expect to ever have children
  • Majority of childless adults say the reason they probably won’t have kids is that they just don’t want to
  • The Conservative Fertility Advantage
  • Fertility Among Immigrants and Native-Born Americans
  • Are unauthorized immigrants overwhelmingly Democrats?

Editor’s Note

LwC is on Substack now! Each day we overwhelm your brains with the content you've come to love from the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website.. but algorithms hide our ranting and raving as best they can. The best way to stick it to Big Tech? Subscribe to For the Content!
